trans-unit.target: TEXT_DUNGEONDEEPDUNGEON_00000_EDDA_000_100<tab>It would seem our guest has overstayed their welcome... Come, my love. Let us show <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> the way out!
TEXT_DUNGEONDEEPDUNGEON_00000_EDDA_000_200<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. So good to see you... I've started anew as an adventurer, just as I promised.
TEXT_DUNGEONDEEPDUNGEON_00000_EDDA_000_210<tab>Would that Avere could see me now...
TEXT_DUNGEONDEEPDUNGEON_00000_EDDA_000_220<tab>But...how did I come to be in this place...? I remember falling... And a robed figure...

TEXT_DUNGEONDEEPDUNGEON_00000_NYBETHOBDILORD_000_500<tab>The art of true resurrection... A challenge even in this world, it would seem. The Traders' Spurn seemed promising, but inevitably renders the subject undead.
TEXT_DUNGEONDEEPDUNGEON_00000_NYBETHOBDILORD_000_510<tab>The magicks of Gridania proved equally ineffective, only pulling souls back from the brink of death, unable to reach beyond the veil.
TEXT_DUNGEONDEEPDUNGEON_00000_NYBETHOBDILORD_000_600<tab>Aether, the great catalyst. The building block from which all creation is born, capable of reconstituting flesh through sheer will.

TEXT_DUNGEONDEEPDUNGEON_00000_NYBETHOBDILORD_000_610<tab>Heh heh heh... How fortuitous that I should be pulled from oblivion to continue my work in this world. More fortuitous still that I should find so fine a specimen as her.
TEXT_DUNGEONDEEPDUNGEON_00000_NYBETHOBDILORD_000_700<tab>...Yet even that experiment ended in failure. Such a pity.

TEXT_DUNGEONDEEPDUNGEON_00000_NYBETHOBDILORD_000_710<tab>She was the key, and with the strength of her spirit I would have flung wide the gates of truth. I would have discovered the means to escape death. Immortality...

TEXT_DUNGEONDEEPDUNGEON_00000_NYBETHOBDILORD_000_800<tab>Morality is but an illusion, and <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> would dare preach its falsehoods to besmirch her spirit, to close her eyes to the truth.
TEXT_DUNGEONDEEPDUNGEON_00000_NYBETHOBDILORD_000_810<tab>Could <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> not see the girl lamented the veil of death? That she would have rejoiced to see it lifted?
TEXT_DUNGEONDEEPDUNGEON_00000_NYBETHOBDILORD_000_900<tab>Tracked me down, have you? It seems my subjects were not as sturdy as I hoped.
TEXT_DUNGEONDEEPDUNGEON_00000_NYBETHOBDILORD_000_910<tab>You stand before Nybeth Obdilord, necromancer and arbiter of life and death.
TEXT_DUNGEONDEEPDUNGEON_00000_NYBETHOBDILORD_000_920<tab>Mine is a noble art, the path to salvation of the body and soul. I have come too far to be stopped by the likes of you!
TEXT_DUNGEONDEEPDUNGEON_00000_NYBETHOBDILORD_000_960<tab>Humanity yearns for salvation from the ravages of death...to cast off the fetters of mortality...
TEXT_DUNGEONDEEPDUNGEON_00000_NYBETHOBDILORD_000_970<tab>Would you not try to free those you hold most dear?
